column5: once built. For the adult fan, it is just as much fun, and is a useful source of basic Technic parts.&nbsp

column3: from the instructions provided by LEGO online, so cannot comment on the box. The (online)&nbsp
column5: are easy to follow, are suitable for the target age range upwards,&nbsp

column1: This set contains 170 parts from the Technic range: a good selection of beams ("
column3: ), pins, axles and connectors. There are also six panel pieces which are used to form the shape of the bonnet and sides.

column1: The build strategy follows many smaller Technic models: start with one side of the lower chassis, then add
column2: the pullback motor as part of the structure. There is some interesting geometry of parts at the front which make for a mostly&nbsp

column1: The roof is only attached at the back, and can move
column2: slightly relative to the dashboard bar (where the&nbsp
column3: steering wheel attached). The main front-to-back structure of the car is formed of only two long beams, and the whole car can flex slightly. This is not a problem in practice, and the overall feel is of a solid vehicle that could stand up to&nbsp

column2: styling of this car is excellent - it is immediately recognisable as a hot-rod, and the stickers really help the theme (though without stickers, the shape of the car is just as good). The &nbsp
column3: choice of colours works well, and the pull-back motor is well hidden in the back of the car.

column2: and fun to drive too. If you are considering buying this as a present for a Lego fan who likes cars, this is a good choice. It shouldn&#39
column3: t frustrate younger Technic builders, it has an aesthetic&nbsp
column4: look to it, and it has the after-build bonus of being race-ready with that pull-back motor built into the back.&nbsp

column1:
,TRUE,5,5,5,5,5 Trueblox","2018-08-08T10:17:56.253Z","Cool build and nice play function!","

Hello, i am Trueblox. And today, i will review set 42046, Getaway Racer.
Lets take a look at the box:
The box has the vehicle and it shows the pull-back feature. Not that interesting.
The car looks very good! i like the design and all of the fire stickers. The play function is cool! I love it! If you pull the car back and let it go, it'
column2: s gonna go pretty far. Works better than Pull-back toys nowadays. It looks very good on display, too. It can also combine with the Police Interceptor.

column1: I love it. Its very good, both to play with and for display. I recommend it for everyone.
